.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.1.0 (2015-09-09)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.1.1(2015-09-10)
---------------------

* More direct import `from pysugarcrm import SugarCRM`
* Added some tests

0.1.2(2016-03-17)
---------------------

* Added POST and PUT methods
* Improved error handling
